item.description: Brazi's is known for their fine Italian food. From pizza to pasta, fish, and sirloin. Their web address - www.brazis.com. You worked hard all week, so take a break from cooking and come break bread with a fun group of people. If your a little late, just ask for the table in Annette's name.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Annette's table. I made a small Meetup sign for the table.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Friday night Dinner at Brazi's
